coldStart.waking: Waking up server... this might take a moment.

error.defaultMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.unexpectedError: We encountered an unexpected error. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

apiErrors.INVALID_TOKEN: Your session has expired. Please sign in again
apiErrors.FORBIDDEN: You do not have permission to perform this action
apiErrors.TASK_NOT_FOUND: The requested task was not found
apiErrors.TAG_NOT_FOUND: The requested tag was not found
apiErrors.VALIDATION_ERROR: Please check your input and try again
apiErrors.CIRCULAR_REFERENCE: This move would create a circular reference
apiErrors.DUPLICATE_TAG: A tag with this name already exists
apiErrors.RATE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: Too many requests. Please try again later
apiErrors.INTERNAL_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again later
apiErrors.DATABASE_ERROR: A database error occurred. Please try again later
apiErrors.NETWORK_ERROR: Unable to connect to the server
apiErrors.LAST_WORKSPACE: You cannot delete or leave your last workspace
apiErrors.LAST_OWNER: Cannot remove or demote the last owner
apiErrors.NOT_A_MEMBER: You are not a member of this workspace
apiErrors.ALREADY_A_MEMBER: User is already a member of this workspace
apiErrors.WORKSPACE_SLUG_TAKEN: A workspace with this name already exists
apiErrors.WORKSPACE_MOVE_INVALID: Cannot move task to the specified workspace
apiErrors.INVITATION_ALREADY_ACCEPTED: This invitation has already been accepted
apiErrors.DUPLICATE_INVITATION: A pending invitation already exists for this email
apiErrors.INVITATION_EMAIL_MISMATCH: Your email doesn't match the invitation
apiErrors.GROUP_MEMBER_NOT_FOUND: User is not a member of this group
apiErrors.ALREADY_A_GROUP_MEMBER: User is already in this group
apiErrors.TOKEN_EXPIRED: Your session has expired. Please sign in again
